item.title: A love letter to ourselves
item.description: In the fast-paced world we live in, stress often feels like an unwelcome companion. But what if we had a tool to navigate through it? A process can serve as just thatâ€”an anchor in the storm, a love letter from our rational self to our stressed self. A well-defined process is like having a map. It reduces decision fatigue by laying out clear steps, helping us focus on one task at a time.
